About.title: About Me
About.sobre: Developer with 1 year of proven experience in the software industry, I am studying my degree in Systems Analysis and Development at Universidade Paulista - Campus Manaus. Working constantly on a personal/professional level, establishing partnerships and making positive impacts. Junior Developer | React-Native - Node.js - SQL | Fullstack
